file.name: petstore-encoding-headers-key-case-4.yaml
file.content:

openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Swagger Petstore
  license:
    name: MIT
servers:
  - url: http://petstore.swagger.io/v1
paths:
  /pets:
    post:
      summary: Create a pet
      operationId: createPets
      responses:
        default:
          description: unexpected error
          headers:
            foo:
              schema:
                type: string

components:
  responses:
    foo:
      description: unexpected error
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            type: string
          encoding:
            foo:
              contentType: application/json
              headers:
                foo-bar:
                  schema:
                    type: string

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: responses: "foo": content: application/json: unknown encoding prop "foo"
